EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us to Personally Experience a B200 Flight Demo at NBAA 2018 in Orlando, Florida
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Experience the BendixKing AeroVue <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aerovue]]> Integrated Flight Deck in a one-hour King Air B200 flight demo at NBAA <[[https://www.nbaa.org/events/bace/2018/]]> 2018 in Orlando, Florida Oct 16-18!
BendixKing AeroVue Integrated Flight Deck offers:
- Lowers recurring maintenance costs - Meets the ADS-B mandate - Reduces pilot workload and fatigue, increases safety - Reduces aircraft weight up to 125 LBS - Includes industry-leading SmartView™ synthetic vision system - Optional weather radar, XM weather, radar altimeter, traffic alert, ground proximity warning
Limited seats are available. Sign up for the demo today and experience the state of the art glass cockpit for your King Air B200. And visit us at our Honeywell/BendixKing display at booth #2600 at NBAA 2018!
SIGN UP NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/NBAA_AeroVue_Flight_Demo.html]]>
